title: WTB:  N29 Non Baseball Player R.D. Sears
author: Bobsbats

posts.post_title: WTB:  N29 Non Baseball Player R.D. Sears
posts.post_content:
Years ago, my father and I built the N29 Set, minus most of the baseball players, and while that was years ago......I'd like to get back a few key guys if possible.  R.D. Sears  (started our journey to the set),  Capt. Paul Boyton,  Duncan Ross.  Looking for presentable copies. Condition not real important.

Thanks in advance guys.

Bob Hamlin
